input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Technician

Location: Ewa Beach, HI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Maintenance Technician  Schedule:M-F 7:00am-4:30pm Payrate: $18-$20/hr DOE Job Description: Performs wide variety of maintenance duties related to the company’s properties. Assists and works under the direct supervision of the Resident Manager or Maintenance Supervisor performing necessary repairs and preventive maintenance on rental units, maintaining an adequate supply of rental units ready for occupancy and sales presentations. This position is expected to be able to repair and maintain most items on a property without assistance from outside vendors. May assist as required and assigned in painting of interior units, office, laundry rooms, common areas and occupied units. Provides support to Maintenance Supervisor and may be required to handle on-call duty, as necessary. Has ongoing contact with on-site management and office personnel, other maintenance technicians and residents of the property. Understands and supports EAH’s mission and core values. RESPONSIBILITIES Replaces locks and keys, re-key if necessary; checks weather stripping, replacing/repairing if necessary; ensures key policy is being adhered to; ensures security and functioning of doors and windows by testing and repairing as needed.Checks condition of/clean carpet, floor tile, repair and/or replace any necessary.Checks walls and patches; performs all repairs related to interior walls and doors (i.e., patch sheet rock, tape and float, shoot acoustics, apply texture, sand re-varnish doors).Checks electrical fixtures, replaces bad lights, plugs, switches, etc.Checks plumbing, hot water heater, drain lines, supply lines, faucets, commode, tub, shower, repairs when necessary.Tests smoke alarms and replaces if defective.Checks operation of appliances, reports defective appliances to Resident Manager when unable to repair.Changes A/C filter, check coils, cleans when necessary.Checks condition of wallpaper and repairs, and/or replaces when necessary.Caulks counter tops, sinks, bathtubs, etc. as needed.Maintains written status board and uses make ready check list.Performs written resident work orders as assigned by supervisor within 24 hours. Does not complete any work in a resident unit without a work order.Performs annual unit inspections.Ensures the turnover of units (make-ready) within 5 days.Paints and touches up common areas as needed or scheduled by supervisor. Paints all previously painted surfaces in rental unit as scheduled by Resident Manager during make ready procedure, using drop cloths to protect company and personal property.Maintains adequate stock of materials, notifying supervisor when to reorder in a timely manner. In absence of a maintenance supervisor, maintains accurate inventory of all tools and parts; ordering parts and supplies as needed.May travel to suppliers weekly to pick up parts and supplies as directed, unless an emergency or unusual circumstance require additional trips.Maintains tools and equipment in good safe working order. Incorporates both safety and customer service in the performance of all job duties.Attends mandatory trainings and meetings.Actively participates in EAH’s Injury and Illness Prevention Plan, including following correct procedures for lifting and moving heavy equipment and materials, and wearing Personal Protective Equipment, as necessary.Regular and predictable attendance.Performs other duties as assigned, including assisting at other properties as requested. QUALIFICATIONS 2+ Year of Related Apartment Maintenance ExperienceKnowledge and Skills in Plumbing, Electrical, and General MaintenanceCADL, Clean DMV and Reliable Transportation Worksite Comment:Ewa Beach Area 
TO APPLY: Text MAINTENANCE EWA to 808-533-9068 to receive a link to our application or speak to a recruiter.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Maintenance Technician
output_json.summary: Maintenance Technician schedule: M-F 7:00am-4:30pm Payrate: $18-$20/hr DOE
job_responsibilities: Replaces locks and keys, checks weather stripping, ensures security and functioning of doors and windows.
Checks condition of/cleans carpet, floor tile, repairs and/or replaces necessary items.
Checks walls and patches, performs repairs related to interior walls and doors.
Checks electrical fixtures, replaces bad lights, plugs, switches, etc.
Checks plumbing, hot water heater, drain lines, supply lines, faucets, commode, tub, shower, repairs when necessary.
Tests smoke alarms and replaces if defective.
Checks operation of appliances, reports defective appliances to Resident Manager when unable to repair.
Changes A/C filter, checks coils, cleans when necessary.
Checks condition of wallpaper and repairs, replaces when necessary.
Caulks counter tops, sinks, bathtubs, etc. as needed.
Maintains written status board and uses make ready check list.
Performs written resident work orders as assigned by supervisor within 24 hours.
Performs annual unit inspections.
Ensures the turnover of units (make-ready) within 5 days.
Paints and touches up common areas as needed or scheduled by supervisor.
Paints all previously painted surfaces in rental unit as scheduled by Resident Manager during make ready procedure, using drop cloths to protect company and personal property.
Maintains adequate stock of materials, notifies supervisor when to reorder in a timely manner.
In absence of a maintenance supervisor, maintains accurate inventory of all tools and parts; orders parts and supplies as needed.
May travel to suppliers weekly to pick up parts and supplies as directed, unless an emergency or unusual circumstance requires additional trips.
Maintains tools and equipment in good safe working order.
Incorporates both safety and customer service in the performance of all job duties.
Attends mandatory trainings and meetings.

Actively participates in EAH’s Injury and Illness Prevention Plan, including following correct procedures for lifting and moving heavy equipment and materials, and wearing Personal Protective Equipment, as necessary.

other.content: To apply, text MAINTENANCE EWA to 808-533-9068 to receive a link to our application or speak to a recruiter.
